note.p: Career: Possibly set up an observatory at Kingston, Jamaica
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; MT; Taylor Hanoverian; Musgrave
AssocMaterial: Additional information in Box File.
References: D J Bryden, 'The Jamaican Observatories of Colin Campbell, FRS and Alexander Macfarlane, FRS' in NR 1969 vol 24 pp 261-272
Notes: Proposed by Edmond Halley; James Campbell; Stephen Hales or Richard Hale
